item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0369; 07:56AM; 10740 W Moorpark St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pBG2OR; #TolucaLake; 34 Firefighters took just 12 minutes to access, confine and extinguish a fully involved detached garage with dense interior storage, to the rear of a one-story home. Firefighters prevented damage to the pair of nearby structures threatened by flames. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E227 E260 E60 E76 E86 EM14 RA60 RA86 RA860 T27 T60; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0369; 07:44AM; 10740 W Moorpark St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pBG2OR; #TolucaLake; PRELIM: Detached garage to the rear of a one-story home fully involved, threatening nearby structures. ; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E227 E260 E60 E86 RA86 RA860 T27 T60; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1526; 07:30PM; 248 W 108th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vARf68; #BroadwayManchester; Occupied full-size L.A. Unified School District bus (unknown school/function/destination or passenger load) was struck by a vehicle. No physical entrapment. 8 patients total. Unknown age/gender/condition/affiliation/circumstances) One patient will be transported by LAFD ambulance to a hospital shortly, for unspecified injury. Condition undetermined. Others now being medically evaluated at scene. High voltage wires down. LADWP en route, unknown ETA. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic (Incident #4430), CHP (Log #2685), LAUSD, and LASD Century (reportedly first agency at scene).; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E64 EM13 RA64 RA65 RA815 RA864; CH4; 13; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#1526; 06:59PM; 248 W 108th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vARf68; #BroadwayManchester; PRELIM: Vehicle vs (occupied?) school bus, No physical entrapment. High voltage wires down. Unknown if injuries. No further details: Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic (Incident #4430), CHP (Log #2685); FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; E64 RA64 RA864; CH4; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1094; 03:26PM; 244 W 53rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/35H2FKw; #SouthParkDistrict; First arriving 30 Firefighters took 22 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish an outside fire that caused unspecified (believed minor) damage to as many as three exposed structures, including a nearby church. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E21 E215 E221 E233 E33 E46 EM13 RA46 RA66 RA846 SQ21 T15 T21 T33; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0611; 10:38AM; 1360 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ICiCA9; #Downtown; First arriving LAFD personnel report an outside fire confined to a fifth floor balcony extinguished on their arrival. No injury. Firefighters will remain at scene to exhaust smoke from the building. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E203 E210 E215 E3 E4 RA11 RA810 RA813 SQ21 T10 T15 T3 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#1055; 04:03PM; 5130 N Yarmouth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tiRLTy; Encino; Patient update: Four patients were transported. 45yo male (from fire unit), 80 yo female and 24yo male all with possible smoke inhalation transported in fair condition. One adult male firefighter transported with non-life threatening injury in fair condition. LAFD Arson is responding for the cause investigation in conjunction with LAPD. No further details.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; CH8; 16 17 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1055; 03:07PM; 5130 N Yarmouth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tiRLTy; Encino; KNOCKDOWN: 62 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes. The fire was contained to the unit of origin. One patient (age/gender unknown) is being evaluated for injuries. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC1 BC10 BC15 BC9 CM42 E109 E203 E273 E288 E290 E293 E39 E73 E83 E88 E93 EM10 EM17 HR3 RA100 RA93 T3 T73 T88 T90 T93 UR3 UR88; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart
